title: How to make a legacy client's shortcut without starting the update launcher?
body: How to make a legacy client's shortcut ?

replies.body:
The only 100% reliable method that I'm aware of to launch the *Legacy Client* by default is to [**completely clean reinstall**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) the League Client and never complete the Beta Client upgrade. This works for now, but once the New Client is finished, you'll be launching by the New Client for good.

Let me know if you have any questions.

OK. I was going to post about that.  In some places there's are suggestions about creating a desktop shortcut to lol.launcher.exe, but that doesn't work. It opens the legacy client to splash screen, but clicking "Launch" opens the new client anyway and you still have to click the "Launch Legacy Client" link at the bottom.
